content.title: About Me
content.description: My name is Wai Hon Wong and I am a recent graduate at Missouri University of Science and Technology with a passion for microcontrollers and programming . I majored in Computer Engineering and minored in History. In my spare time I like working on small projects, learning new concepts, and working with electronics. Outside of programming, I enjoying playing games with friends and reading. Find my contact information and other links below.

content.title: Minesweeper (C#)
content.description: I remade Minesweeper in C# to accustom myself to using Visual Studio and other features C# has to offer. The program utilizes Windows Forms and sets the board based on the gamestate using buttons that are dynamically generated.

content.title: Portfolio
content.description: My personal website to showcase my experience and skills. The website is created using JavaScript with minimal use of HTML and CSS.

content.title: MTG Search Discord Bot
content.description: A Discord bot written in Python to search for a specified card using the MTG API and Beautiful Soup 4. The bot is hosted on a Raspberry Pi 3.

content.title: Discord LED Monitor
content.description: Threaded program written in Python to constantly read the user voice status in Discord. The status will be displayed using LEDs. The device is run on an Arduino Uno R3 with PyFirmata loaded on.

content.title: ShiftOutPy
content.description: ShiftOut code adapted to Python from Arduino. The code is made to be used with a 74HC595, an 8-bit Shift Register.
